title: [CLIENT] Missing Legacy Skins
body:
Hi all!
I'm not sure if somebody already mentioned this in another discussion, but I'll bring it up here anyway!
Recently, I have noticed that some of my legacy skins are missing from the Profile/Champions tab. I have checked in the store skins section, and yes I have unchecked and checked the owned boxes. They are just missing lol!
**BUT, I am still able to use them in-game. ** So it's not THAT big of a deal. Just worried that they might go missing from the champion select screen too one day.

So, after a long night of checking each Profile/Champion tab, and then going into a custom games champion selection, I have comprised a list of legacy skins that are not displaying in the Profile/Champion tab, but that I am 100% sure that I own.

TWO things that I've noticed are:
1. Not ALL legacy skins are missing! Only the ones that are:
2. Part of the upcoming sales this Month (Snowdown/Snowstorm)

The skins that are missing from my Profile/Champions tab are:
* Matador Alistar, Queen Ashe, Safari Caitlyn, Mr. Mundoverse, Executioner Mundo, Fiddle Me Timbers, Dark Candy Fiddlesticks, Toy Soldier GP, Desert Trooper Garen, Caterpillar Kog'Maw, Sonoran Kog'Maw, Defender Leona, Exiled Morgana, Lollipoppy, Molten Rammus, Frozen Shen, Hextech Sion, Badger Teemo, Firefighter Tristana, Guerilla Tristana, The Magnificent TF, Vandal Twitch, Butcher Urgot, Baron Von Veigar, Bad Santa Veigar, Viscero Xin Zhao, Winged Hussar Xin Zhao.

That's quite a few, and they have that one thing in common, except lollipoppy maybe (I cant find her on either sale list)

Like I said before, not that big of a deal, since I'm still able to use them, but it'll just be nice to see them in the profile tab so that I can show them off to friends. A lot of money has been put into these skins through store and mystery gifting, so to be able to display them would be nice. Not sure if it's a bug with the upcoming sales or whatnot.

**Anyway, I know how to take screenshots, but I'm not familiar with imgur and all that, so if someone is willing to tell me in steps, I'll be glad to post some.**

Thanks for taking the time to read this, and hopefully it'll be fixed soon. And check your skins!

PM.

replies.body:
Hey Post Mortem! 

Thank you for the well-detailed report! We'll take a look into this and see what's causing this to occur! :]

I have noticed this in the recent past as well. However with the new client on the way it didn't seem like a big deal to me. My main reason being it looked like a very obvious bug as only skins that were available in the shop would show up and champions would cost ????ip or ???rp. This probably stems from riot hiding skins that are not available, because if they didn't we would see a lot more thread begging to have limited skins come back. Anyways I haven't seen this in champion select only in my profile, that's my two cents.
Yup! It has to do with legacy skins and their availability. Thanks for the additional context! ^-^

[UPDATE] Dark Candy Fiddlesticks, Lollipoppy, and Bad Santa Veigar are showing up on my Profile/Champion tab again :) The others, i.e, Badger Teemo, are still missing, but still selectable from champion select. Thanks for your continued hard work for getting this bug fixed! 
PM

Hiya!
Just wondering how you're going with the champion profile bug thing? Still unable to see certain legacy skins in profile/champion tab. Still able to use them in champ select though. Many thanks. 
PM
I'm not sure. I don't personally work on this content (I work on the creation of the skins). I've passed this on to the store team who is tackling this. I know they're currently looking into it. :]

Hi!
I went to my champion tab in my profile when the snowstorm sale started and yay! The skins that were missing from CDP (that are part of this sale) are displaying again. 
Many thanks and Merry X-mas!
PM
Merry Christmas to you as well! ^-^

Thank you for the speedy response! And thank you for taking the time to look into this. As I said though, I can still use these skins in-game, so not much of a biggie, unless I lose them completely! Lol

You certainly won't lose them! ^-^ 

The proper team is currently looking into this. Looks like it's an issue regarding legacy skins being available v. the Champion Detail Page. Normally, if a legacy skin isn't available, it won't show in the CDP, but if you own it, it obviously should. Something isn't playing nice and we'e trying to figure out why!
